00001.Structural Notes: 70 stories marked with <div>. Frame story introduction and conclusion are included in first and last of these, respectively.

00002.Structural Notes: The text has no inherent structure other than the widely recognized distinction of Pūrvabhāga (attributed to Bāṇa himself) and Uttarabhāga (completed by Bāṇa's son, Bhūṣaṇabhaṭṭa, after Bāṇa's death). Paragraphs created by Peterson are marked by starting page and line number.
